Title: Portfolio Website
Features: Responsive Design: Optimized for all devices, ensuring a great experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Portfolio Showcase: Display projects, skills, and achievements in an organized and visually appealing manner.
Contact Form: Allow visitors to send messages and inquiries directly through the website.

Title: LoadMaster Robot
Description: Automated Color-Based Sorting and Transportation Robot using Arduino (Group)
Features: Automated Color Sorting: Detects product colors and sorts items accurately.
Predefined Path Navigation: Follows a fixed route using a line-following mechanism.
Automated Storage Placement: Places goods in correct storage areas based on color codes.
Wireless Control: Can be controlled via remote controller or mobile phone.
Obstacle & Human Detection: Automatically stops to ensure workplace safety.
Weight Overload Protection: Detects excess weight and alerts users to prevent damage.

Title: Urban Food E-Commerce Website
Description: Project Based on React,OracleDB and MongoDB (Group)
Features: User Authentication: Secure login and registration with JWT.
Product Management: Add, edit, and delete products with real-time updates.
Shopping Cart: Seamless product addition and checkout process.
Order Tracking: Real-time order status updates and notifications.
Admin Dashboard: Manage users, products, and orders efficiently.
Responsive Design: Optimized for all devices, ensuring a great experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
SEO Optimization: Implement SEO best practices to improve visibility and search engine rankings.
Payment Integration: Secure payment processing with multiple options.
Real-Time Notifications: Instant updates on order status and promotions.
Analytics Dashboard: Insights into user behavior, sales trends, and product performance.
Customer Reviews: Allow users to leave feedback and ratings for products.

Title: Ludo Online
Description: Multiplayer Online Ludo Game playable on web browsers (Group Project)
Features: User Authentication: Register and login using unique usernames.
Multiplayer Gameplay: Create or join lobbies and play with up to 4 players in real time.
Real-Time Updates: Dice rolls, token movements, and turns synchronized using WebSockets.
Standard Ludo Rules: Four tokens per player with accurate turn and movement logic.
Undo Move Feature: Allows players to undo the last move using stack-based logic.
Leaderboard System: Displays personal and global rankings using efficient sorting and data structures.
Mobile-Friendly UI: Fully responsive design for desktop and mobile devices.

Title: Servalk â€“ Service Booking App
Description: On-demand service booking platform connecting customers with service providers (Group Project)
Features: User Authentication: Customers and service providers can register and log in securely.
Service Booking System: Users can browse services, select categories, and place booking requests.
Job Status Tracking: Track booking status including Pending, Accepted, Rejected, Unpaid, Completed, and Cancelled.
Multiple Service Categories: Supports home services, education, automotive, wellness, technology, and more.
Flexible Pricing Models: Hourly, fixed fee, daily fee, and price per square foot supported.
Provider Management: Service providers can accept or reject job requests in real time.
Payment Status Handling: Tracks unpaid and completed services for better transaction management.

Title: BioPay System
Description: Biometric payment system using face recognition with microservices architecture (Group Project)
Features: Face-Based Payments: Secure payment processing using facial recognition technology.
Microservices Architecture: Separate biometric and payment services connected via API Gateway.
Multi-Platform Applications: User and merchant mobile apps (Flutter) with an admin web panel (React).
Secure Authentication: JWT-based authentication with encrypted data storage.
Real-Time Verification: Biometric service verifies face data using embeddings instead of raw images.
Scalable Deployment: Docker-based setup with support for CI/CD and cloud deployment.
Admin Management Panel: Monitor users, merchants, transactions, and system status.
